body.p: In late 2002 the Board set up a project team comprising representatives from the national standard‑setters in Germany, New Zealand and the United Kingdom and from the Canadian Institute of Chartered Accountants. The project team examined the potential for issuing a standard or guidance on management commentary. In October 2005 the Board published the results of the project team’s research in a discussion paper Management Commentary.
